endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: Input image file path or URL

parameters.description: Input image file path or URL

parameters.name: mask_format

param_schema.title: Mask Format
param_schema.description: RLE encoding format for masks. 'coco_rle' (default) or 'custom_rle'

parameters.description: RLE encoding format for masks. 'coco_rle' (default) or 'custom_rle'

parameters.name: mask_output

param_schema.title: Mask Output
param_schema.description: Single-line DSL defining composite masks (overrides default one-per-term).  Infix operators (left-to-right):    `&` → AND,  `|` or `+` → OR,  `A - B` → A AND NOT(B),  `-term` → NOT(term),  `XOR`.  Example: 'rider: man + horse; dog: dog'

parameters.description: Single-line DSL defining composite masks (overrides default one-per-term).  Infix operators (left-to-right):    `&` → AND,  `|` or `+` → OR,  `A - B` → A AND NOT(B),  `-term` → NOT(term),  `XOR`.  Example: 'rider: man + horse; dog: dog'

parameters.name: mask_prompt

param_schema.title: Mask Prompt
param_schema.description: Comma-separated names of the objects to be detected

parameters.description: Comma-separated names of the objects to be detected
